beats.description: Axes and two vectors with angle
beats.manim_code:
self.play(self.objects['title'].animate.scale(0.5).to_edge(UP))
axes = Axes(x_range=[-1,5,1], y_range=[-1,4,1], x_length=6, y_length=4, axis_config={"color": GREY})
axes.move_to(ORIGIN)
self.play(Create(axes))
import numpy as np
# Define vectors in coordinate space
a = np.array([3.0, 1.0, 0.0])
b = np.array([2.0, 2.0, 0.0])
origin = axes.c2p(0, 0)
a_end = axes.c2p(a[0], a[1])
b_end = axes.c2p(b[0], b[1])
va = Arrow(origin, a_end, buff=0, color=BLUE, stroke_width=6)
vb = Arrow(origin, b_end, buff=0, color=GREEN, stroke_width=6)
self.play(GrowArrow(va), GrowArrow(vb))
# Labels near tips
la = MathTex(r"\\vec{a}", color=BLUE).scale(0.9)
lb = MathTex(r"\\vec{b}", color=GREEN).scale(0.9)
va_dir = a_end - origin
vb_dir = b_end - origin
la.move_to(a_end + 0.25 * va_dir / np.linalg.norm(va_dir))
lb.move_to(b_end + 0.25 * vb_dir / np.linalg.norm(vb_dir))
self.play(FadeIn(la), FadeIn(lb))
# Angle arc between a and b at the origin
th_a = np.arctan2(va_dir[1], va_dir[0])
th_b = np.arctan2(vb_dir[1], vb_dir[0])
start = min(th_a, th_b)
ang = abs(th_b - th_a)
arc = Arc(radius=0.7, start_angle=start, angle=ang, arc_center=origin, color=YELLOW)
th_label = MathTex(r"\\theta", color=YELLOW).scale(0.8)
th_label.move_to(arc.point_from_proportion(0.5) + 0.2*UP)
self.play(Create(arc), FadeIn(th_label))
self.wait(0.5)
# Store
self.objects['axes'] = axes
self.objects['va'] = va
self.objects['vb'] = vb
self.objects['la'] = la
self.objects['lb'] = lb
self.objects['arc'] = arc
self.objects['theta_label'] = th_label
self.objects['a_vec'] = a
self.objects['b_vec'] = b
self.objects['origin'] = origin
self.objects['a_end'] = a_end
self.objects['b_end'] = b_end

beats.description: Show formulas and projection of a onto b
beats.manim_code:
formula = MathTex(r"\\vec a \\cdot \\vec b = \\|\\vec a\\|\\,\\|\\vec b\\|\\cos\\theta = a_x b_x + a_y b_y", color=WHITE).scale(0.8)
formula.next_to(self.objects['title'], DOWN, buff=0.2)
self.play(Write(formula))
# Projection of a onto b
import numpy as np
axes = self.objects['axes']
a = self.objects['a_vec']
b = self.objects['b_vec']
origin = self.objects['origin']
a_end = self.objects['a_end']
# Compute projection length and draw
b_len = np.linalg.norm(b)
dot_ab = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[1]
b_hat = b / b_len
proj_len = dot_ab / b_len
proj_end = axes.c2p(b_hat[0]*proj_len, b_hat[1]*proj_len)
proj = Line(origin, proj_end, color=YELLOW, stroke_width=6)
drop = DashedLine(a_end, proj_end, color=GREY)
self.play(Create(proj), Create(drop))
self.wait(0.5)
# Store
self.objects['formula'] = formula
self.objects['proj'] = proj
self.objects['drop'] = drop
self.objects['dot_ab'] = dot_ab
self.objects['b_len'] = b_len

eq1 = MathTex(r"\\vec a=(3,1),\\; \\vec b=(2,2)", color=WHITE).scale(0.9)
eq2 = MathTex(r"\\vec a \\cdot \\vec b = 3\\cdot 2 + 1\\cdot 2 = 8", color=WHITE).scale(0.9)
eq3 = MathTex(r"\\cos\\theta = \\dfrac{8}{\\sqrt{10}\\,\\sqrt{8}}", color=WHITE).scale(0.9)
eqs = VGroup(eq1, eq2, eq3).arrange(DOWN, aligned_edge=LEFT, buff=0.15)
eqs.to_edge(RIGHT)
self.play(LaggedStart(*[Write(m) for m in [eq1, eq2, eq3]], lag_ratio=0.2))
self.wait(0.5)
self.objects['eqs'] = eqs
